titleStmt.title: By the Lieutenant-General Ginckell, commander in chief of their Majesties forces. Whereas the right honourable the Lords-Justices of Ireland, have by their proclamation of this days date commanded that no person whatsoever do presume to carry to the camp any beer or ale, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.
Reede-Ginckel, Godard, Baron van, 1644-1703.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook assignee of Benjamin Tooke printer to the King and Queen at their Majesties printing-house on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
